title: Guy Opperman – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Guy Opperman, the Conservative MP for Hexham, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content: I remain of the view that Rishi Sunak is the right person to be our Prime Minister.
He is a serious person for serious times.
He was right about the economy during the summer: we need his leadership to get us back on track.
